con ayuda de {{Sergio4j}}: MATCH (k {name: "Keanu Reeves"}), (b:Person)-[:ACTED_IN]->() WHERE NOT (k)-[:ACTED_IN]->()<-[:ACTED_IN]-(b) and k<>b RETURN b
soluciÃ³n: MATCH (keanu:Person)-[:ACTED_IN]->()<-[:ACTED_IN]-(c),(c)-[:ACTED_IN]->()<-[:ACTED_IN]-(coc) WHERE keanu.name = "Keanu Reeves" AND NOT((keanu)-[:ACTED_IN]->()<-[:ACTED_IN]-(coc)) AND coc <> keanu RETURN coc.name, count(coc) ORDER BY count(coc) DESC
